SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: A successful POST request will return the newly created custom field:
A successful GET request will return an array of custom fields:

PARAMETERS.NAME: linkTo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Where the Custom Field links to. Available options are [contact,classEnrolment,class,workshop,workshopBooking,organisation,marketingAgent,portfolio,studentActivity,enrolmentGroup,unitEnrolment].

PARAMETERS.NAME: variableName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The internal name of the Custom Field, used for setting the value in other endpoints i.e. customField_ant : red.

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Type of the Custom Field - i.e. Text, Select, Radio. Available options are [text,number,date,textarea,html,url,select,radio,select-multi,checkbox].

PARAMETERS.NAME: options
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: For Custom Fields where a list of values are needed. One of the listed types must be used [select,radio,select-multi,checkbox]. Example string with brackets ['one','two','three'].

PARAMETERS.NAME: label
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Label for the Custom Field.

PARAMETERS.NAME: active
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether the field is active or not.

PARAMETERS.NAME: includeAnyStatus
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: By default, only the active custom fields are returned. If this field is set, both active and inactive custom fields will be returned.

PARAMETERS.NAME: orderBy
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The field to order the results by. Default ordered by label name.

PARAMETERS.NAME: notLinkedTo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Exclude the linkTo value from the results.

PARAMETERS.NAME: searchTerm
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Search for a specific term in the label or variable name.

PARAMETERS.NAME: mandatory
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether the field is mandatory or not for completion (Unit Enrolments only).

PARAMETERS.NAME: availableToExternal
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether this field should be displayed externally (i.e. Certificate Validation page) (Unit Enrolments only).

PARAMETERS.NAME: offset
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used for paging - start at record. Both offset and limit needs to work paging.

PARAMETERS.NAME: limit
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used for paging - total records to retrieve. Both offset and limit needs to work paging.

DESCRIPTION: Create a new custom field or search existing custom fields.
